com.ihealth.communication.control

Class BPControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.BPControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class BPControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for Continua BP

    The class provides methods to control Continua BP. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a Continua BP, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new Continua BP, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect Continua BP.

    A iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) callback is triggered to report the memory. Action : ACTION_HISTORY_DATA_CBP Example:{"bp_unit":0,"bp_timestampflag":1,"bp_pulserateflag":1,"bp_useridflag":1,"bp_measurestatusflag":1,"bp_hsdflag":0,"bp_sys":119,"bp_dia":76,"bp_map":0,"bp_timestamp":"2015-1-1 1:0:0","bp_pulserate":78,"bp_userid":1,"bp_body_movement":0,"bp_cufffit":0,"bp_irregular":0,"bp_pulseraterange":0,"bp_position":0,"bp_hsd":0}

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        get battery for Continua Bp device
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_CBP, the keys of message will show in KeyList of the action.

      • getFeature

        public void getFeature()
        get the feature for Continua Bg device
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_FEATURE_CBP, the keys of message will show in KeyList of the action.

      • commandSetUser

        public void commandSetUser(int UserID)
        set current user
      • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
      • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
      • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_CONFORM_CHOOSE_USER_CBP, the keys of message will show in KeyList of the action.

  • getData

    public void getData()
    get the data for the current user
  • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
  • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
  • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_HISTORY_DATA_CBP, the keys of message will show in KeyList of the action.
